attributes.action: Discuss increasing incidents of racism in football and Sepp Blatter's recent comments
attributes.additional_details:
I believe that the UK Government should have a motion to discuss the increasing levels of racism in football and also the recent comments made by Sepp Blatter (Fifa Chairman) stating that racism does not exist in football.

The Government were happy enough to get involved in the 2018 World Cup bid so should also get involved in something like this.
